titleStmt.title: Articles to be inquired of, in the first metropoliticall visitation, of the most reuerend father, Richard by Gods prouidence, Arch-bushop [sic] of Canterbury, and primat of all England in, and for the dioces of Peterborough, in the yeare of our Lord God 1607, and in the third yeare of His Graces translation.
titleStmt.author: Church of England. Province of Canterbury. Archbishop (1604-1610 : Bancroft)
Bancroft, Richard, 1544-1610.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
